oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Forced Vibration Analysis in the Context of Dynamic SIFs in Impact Bending Tests
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: CHAVAN, VM
MAITI, SK
DUTTA, BK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: stress intensity factor
time diagram determination
modal approach
specimens
beam
dynamic analysis of short beam with crack
dynamic stress intensity factor
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Motion of a Timoshenko beam with a crack is analyzed by representing it through a massless rotational spring. This is relevant for evaluation of dynamic stress intensity factor (DSIF) in one- or three-point impact bend tests. The model predictions compare well with experimental results reported in the literature.
